divs: sighting detailsi first observed these objects when i went outside to watch fireworks last night. i notice when fireworks were going a redish\orange ball and then noticed a second one not far behind it. i then went to the back of my house and saw about 6-10 coming from a completely different direction with one behind the other and there were a couple of planes in the area at the time. the last ones i noticed were completely red, they were not just floating like a chinese lantern you could clearly tell something intelligent was controlling them. they were also way to bright to be a floating lantern they were about as bright as a plane headlight considering they were shining perfectly threw a decent amount of smoke from all the fire works going off.
Summary: Bright Redish orange balls that were all over the place
